enSynonyms: Stretch your raised leg out behind you.
Reach your elevated leg straight back.
Lengthen your lifted leg towards the rear.
Push your raised leg back in a straight line.

en: Place your palms on the pads of your fingers.
enSynonyms: Rest your hands on the soft cushions of your fingertips.
Position your palms over the fleshy parts of your fingers.
Lay your hands gently onto the padded areas of your fingertips.
Support your palms on the cushioned tips of your digits.
Settle your hands atop the rounded ends of your fingers.
